attributes.action: Open up Liverpool lime st to outbound traffic coming from Elliot st.
attributes.additional_details: This issue will not get reviewed on a local level and needs government intervention to push these changes through. The current system has split the city centre in two and is causing a lot of bottlenecks
attributes.background: Open up the 20 yard stretch of pedestrianised area on lime street to allow one way traffic out of the city centre to reduce congestion

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local roads are a matter for local authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
